song.title: Holy Is The Lord
song.lyrics:
[V] .G C D We stand and lift up our hands . Em C D For the joy of the Lord is our strength || .G C D We bow down and worship Him now . Em C D How great how awesome is He
[P] . A And together we sing . C Everyone sing
[C] . G C D Holy is the Lord God Almighty . Em C D The earth is filled with His glory
[B] . G D It's rising up all around . F C It's the anthem of the Lord's renown . G D It's rising up all around . F C It's the anthem of the Lord's renown
song.presentation: V P C V P C B P C
